name: Ramming Speed, Helmsman!
description:
A shooter without the shooting! Made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018.

WARNING: Game will probably be very, very laggy

Additional assets:

Font: https://fontmeme.com/fonts/final-frontier-old-style-font/

Explosion: https://opengameart.org/content/comic-explosion-kaboom

Space Stuff: https://opengameart.org/content/space-shooter-art
